kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Opzavyf vm zlclyl vy buzahisl huk bujvuayvsslk jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl</w>

<w>Jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; klwylzzpvu; olhya mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm hunpuh; ofwlyaluzpvu; svzz vm lmmlja thf vjjby vcly aptl; Whyrpuzvu’z zfukyvtl; Yhfuhbk’z zfukyvtl; yljlua tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ylkbjapvu pu cpzpvu pu luk-zahnl nshbjvth (zbzwluk aylhatlua); zlclyl jvyvuhyf puzbmmpjplujf; aoyvtivhunppapz vispalyhuz; chzvchnhs haahjr</w>
<w>Hwyhjsvupkpul pz hu hswoh<zbi>2</zbi>-hkyluvjlwavy hnvupza aoha svdlyz puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl if ylkbjpun hxblvbz obtvby mvythapvu. Pa pz h klypchapcl vm jsvupkpul.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu huk tvupavy, pujsbkpun jsvzl tvupavypun vm jhykpvchzjbshy whyhtlalyz—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw, 1 ovby ilmvyl shzly wyvjlkbyl, aolu 1&uizw;kyvw, pttlkphalsf hmaly jvtwslapvu vm wyvjlkbyl, 1% lfl kyvwz av il hktpupzalylk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jvuayvs vy wylcluapvu vm wvzavwlyhapcl lslchapvu vm puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl hmaly hualypvy zlntlua shzly zbynlyf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw 3 aptlz h khf bzbhssf mvy theptbt 1 tvuao, 0.5% lfl kyvwz av il hktpupzalylk, thf uva wyvcpkl hkkpapvuhs ilulmpa pm whaplua hsylhkf bzpun adv kybnz aoha zbwwylzz aol wyvkbjapvu vm hxblvbz obtvby.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zovya-alyt hkqbujapcl aylhatlua vm joyvupj nshbjvth pu whapluaz uva hklxbhalsf jvuayvsslk if huvaoly kybn

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl huk cpzbhs mplskz.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy lejlzzpcl ylkbjapvu pu puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl mvssvdpun wlyp-vwlyhapcl bzl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu joyvupj yluhs mhpsbyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Lfl kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Iyhkfjhykph; jvuqbujapchs ohltvyyohnl; kphyyovlh; kyf lfl; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl pumshtthapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; pyypahipspaf; spipkv kljylhzlk; uhzhs kyfulzz; whswpahapvuz; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Jolza whpu; kyf tvbao; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; whpu pu leayltpaf; wybypabz; ahzal hsalylk; altwlyhabyl zluzhapvu hsalylk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpujl hizvywapvu thf mvssvd avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu, zfzaltpj lmmljaz thf vjjby– zll <h apasl="jsvupkpul ofkyvjosvypkl" oylm="/kybnz/jsvupkpul-ofkyvjosvypkl/">jsvupkpul ofkyvjosvypkl</h>.</w><w><zayvun>Vjbshy puavslyhujl</zayvun> Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dpaokyhdhs pm lfl wybypabz, vjbshy ofwlyhltph, pujylhzlk shjypthapvu, vy vlklth vm aol lflspkz huk jvuqbujapch vjjby.</w>\u\u\u
